sections.text:
72-2103.Commission members; expenses.

The members of the Governor's Residence Advisory Commission shall serve without compensation. The members shall be reimbursed for expenses as provided in sections 81-1174 to 81-1177.

SourceLaws 1998, LB 1129, ยง 30;Laws 2020, LB381, ยง 81.Termination Date: July 1, 2026
